Subject: Reg: CAP Policy : File attachment is not blocking || Sriwin Electrical ||
Description:
Hi Support Team,
 
Configured CAD file and PDF files attachment blocking policy for our windows users. It is getting blocked on Web URL's only. and it is not blocking while attaching into the mail clients.
If any files have the drawing data inside the file. It should block. but this is also not working for us as we expected.


 
Regards,
Prasanth
Solution_Comment__c: The CAP policy was not blocking the user to add attachments to email, but he stopped him from sending it due to the file extensions.
